title: Hilarious moment toddler shows her disgust after trying cranberry juice for the first time
text:
This is the moment that an adorable toddler took her first sip of cranberry juice and was none too impressed with the taste.

Elynn, who's from Greenbelt, Maryland was caught on camera by her mother Maya Lee as she drank from a glass on September 18.

The 18-month-old, who is sitting on the floor, eagerly reaches out for the glass, containing a small amount of cranberry juice.

She brings the glass up to her mouth and takes a good sized sip.

When she is done, she looks up at the camera, wide-eyed, before opening and closing her mouth, trying to make sense of the new taste.

Her nose wrinkles up and she frowns in hilarious revulsion to the drink.

She opens her mouth in disgust and waves her right arm in protest as mum Maya laughs in the background.

Elynn from Greenbelt, Maryland, brings the glass up to her mouth and takes a good sized sip. Her nose wrinkles up and she frowns in hilarious revulsion to the drink

Mum, Maya Lee, who captured her daughter's reaction said she thought the toddler might enjoy the tartness of cranberry but admitted it looks like Elynn has had her first and last taste of cranberry juice

Elynn looks like she can't believe what she has just tasted.

Maya told Storyful that her daughter is strongly opinionated when it comes to taste.

'She loves the taste of lemon and hates lime,' Maya said.

She added she thought her daughter might enjoy the tartness of cranberry but admitted it looks like Elynn has had her first and last taste of cranberry.
description: Elynn of Greenbelt, Maryland is clearly unimpressed with the tartness of the cranberry juice. Wide-eyed, she hilariously opens and closes her mouth in disgust.
